summary: Completed comprehensive RAG pipeline testing for Archiva app iteration 3. Backend RAG functionality is 100% operational with OpenAI API key properly configured. All requested RAG endpoints verified working. Frontend has login issues preventing full UI testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Login form accepts credentials but does not successfully authenticate/redirect to main application
ui_bugs.details: Form fills correctly, button clicks, but remains on login page. Different from iterations 1&2 where login worked.

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access main application UI to test frontend RAG features
integration_issues.impact: Frontend RAG features (Upload, Library, Search, AI Chat pages) cannot be tested via UI

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (/api/) returns status ok
User login via API successful - token generation working
Embedding system: 2 files, 2 with embeddings, 4 total embeddings
OpenAI text-embedding-3-small model configured and working
File upload with AI tagging: 8 AI-generated healthcare tags created
POST /api/files/upload: AI tagging generates relevant healthcare terms
Semantic search finds documents about AI in healthcare
POST /api/chat with RAG query: 1231 character response with 4 sources
AI chat cites specific document content with relevance scores
RAG pipeline correctly identifies healthcare, medical, cancer, diagnostic terms
Backend authentication, file management, and AI services fully functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend login authentication flow - login form appears but authentication does not complete successfully. Backend APIs are 100% functional including full RAG pipeline (file upload, AI tagging, embeddings, semantic search, AI chat with sources). All requested RAG endpoints verified working via API testing.
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (13/13 core + RAG features working), Frontend: 20% (login form loads but authentication fails)
